title: I have a type tool question ???
content:
Hello,  
can you import illustrations from illustrator into type tool?

Thanks!
author: Knight

comments.content:
Its possible and common. Try out the [FontLab](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021221023/http:/typophile.com/wiki/FontLab) Demo.

Have a look:

[http://groups.msn.com/fontlab/tipsandtricks.msnw?action=get\_message&mvie...](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021221023/http:/groups.msn.com/fontlab/tipsandtricks.msnw?action=get_message&mview=1&ID_Message=2675 "http://groups.msn.com/fontlab/tipsandtricks.msnw?action=get\_message&mview=1&ID\_Message=2675")

-- [astype.de](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021221023/http:/www.astype.de/)--

cool thanks!  
\< J o s e p h \>
